assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: NRB Bearings Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of ball and roller bearings to original equipment manufacturers in India and internationally. The company offers a range of high-precision friction solutions, such as drawn cup needle and cylindrical roller bearings, polyamide and steel needle bearing cages, full-complement needle bearings, formed strip cages for heavy gear boxes, special ball bearings, tapered and spherical roller bearings, planetary shafts and other special pins, crank pins, thrust bearings, and rocker arm bearings. It primarily serves automotive and mobility industries. The company was formerly known as Needle Roller Bearing Company Limited and changed its name to NRB Bearings Limited in 1990. NRB Bearings Limited was founded in 1965 and is based in Mumbai, India.
